member.name: IUIAnimationVariableIntegerChangeHandler.OnIntegerValueChanged

summary.para: Handles events that occur when the value of an animation variable changes.
This method receives updates as INT32 values. To receive updates as DOUBLE values, use the method.

member.param: The storyboard that is animating the animation variable specified by the variable parameter.
The animation variable that has been updated.
The new value of the animation variable, rounded according to the variable's rounding mode.
The previous value of the animation variable, rounded according to the variable's rounding mode.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariableIntegerChangeHandler
member.summary: Defines a method for handling animation variable update events.
